entries.title: Elder Scrolls Online teases involvement of immortal Lovecraft crab tentacle demon in this year's expansion
entries.description: The Nine Divines are boring! Daedra? They're never boring!

entries.title: Muppets Inside was a classic of the 'CD-ROM full of stuff' era
entries.description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

entries.title: Phantom Liberty will be the biggest add-on CD Projekt has ever made⁠—by budget
entries.description: I have desperately wanted a Cyberpunk 2077 Hearts of Stone for two years.

entries.title: Overwatch 2 players are mistakenly blaming Mercy for its balance problems
entries.description: In the absence of anything else to talk about, Overwatch players look to Mercy.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #581, January 21
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #581 puzzle.

entries.title: The people trying to work in a virtual office have found themselves in a real mess
entries.description: Employees are struggling with virtual workplaces.

entries.title: Marvel's Avengers won't be supported after September
entries.description: The game will still be playable for owners, including online, for the foreseeable future.

entries.title: Xbox boss Phil Spencer says layoffs were 'painful' but necessary for 'long-term success'
entries.description: Spencer addressed the recent layoff of 10,000 Microsoft employees in an email sent to gaming division employees.
